description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Cagliari vs Inter Milan in the Serie A
title: Cagliari vs Inter Milan: Serie A stats & head-to-head
title_page: Cagliari vs Inter Milan: Serie A stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 2 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt saved. Mattia Felici (Cagliari) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Michel Adopo.
Post
Yann Bisseck (Inter Milan) wins a free kick on the right wing.
